docs.snippet: ESPN had thought about creating a site about race for a while but a meeting in 2013 between Jason Whitlock and John Skipper, the president of ESPN, persuaded Skipper to hand the job to Whitlock....
docs.lead_paragraph: ESPN had thought about creating a site about race for a while but a meeting in 2013 between Jason Whitlock and John Skipper, the president of ESPN, persuaded Skipper to hand the job to Whitlock.
docs.abstract: Richard Sandomir Sports Business column notes that ESPN is launching website The Undefeated, which is structured around familiar and sometimes controversial personality of commentator Jason Whitlock, in hopes of becoming more popular with African-Americans.

headline.main: For ESPN’s New Website on Race, a Fervent Leader in Jason Whitlock
headline.print_headline: For ESPN’s New Website on Race, a Fervent and Familiar Persona

docs.snippet: A group of prominent black coaches headlined by Tubby Smith and Shaka Smart are forming an organization to address the dwindling numbers of minority head coaches in college basketball....
docs.lead_paragraph: A group of prominent black coaches headlined by Tubby Smith and Shaka Smart are forming an organization to address the dwindling numbers of minority head coaches in college basketball.

headline.main: Top College Coaches Form Group to Address Minority Hires
headline.print_headline: Top College Coaches Form Group to Address Minority Hires

docs.snippet: The world champion has long let his peripatetic spirit guide him, and now he’s set his sights on a new title: men’s wear designer....
docs.lead_paragraph: The world champion has long let his peripatetic spirit guide him, and now he’s set his sights on a new title: men’s wear designer.
docs.abstract: American pro surfer Kelly Slater is branching out into fashion world as he launches his own men's wear label, Outerknown.

headline.main: Surfer Kelly Slater Wades Into Fashion

docs.snippet: This exhibition spotlights how and why weird and astonishing species thrive in the most extreme conditions....
docs.lead_paragraph: This exhibition spotlights how and why weird and astonishing species thrive in the most extreme conditions.
docs.abstract: American Museum of Natural History exhibition Life at the Limits: Stories of Amazing Species explains evolution of some of world's strangest and most astonishing creatures.

headline.main: In ‘Life at the Limits,’ Extreme Creatures at American Museum of Natural History
headline.print_headline: Feast Your Eyes, but Hold Your Nose
